item.title: My National Park Adventures
item.description: In 2025, I’ve been to nine national parks, and each of them have been a life-changing experience. In January, we snowshoed in Glacier NP while skiing in Whitefish, MT. In March, my friends and I drove up from LA to Yosemite National Park. In July and August, I spent over three weeks driving around the Rocky Mountains from Austin, Texas all the way up to Yellowstone in Wyoming. Here’s my recap, through data and photos!
